sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: ROS-solis, Sun-dew, an agreeable ſpirituous liquor, compoſed of burnt brandy, ſugar, cinnamon, and milk-water ; and ſometimes perfumed with a little milk. It has its name from being at firſt prepared wholly of the juice of the plant ros ſolis, or droſera. See Drosera.
